scripts.uglify: mkdir -p dist/js && uglifyjs dist/js/babelify.js -m -b -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs dist/js/babelify.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:css && npm run uglify
scripts.start: npm run preloadProject && parallelshell 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:bundle' 'npm run watch:js'
scripts.preloadProject: npm run browserifyRequires && npm run buildBabel && npm run uglify
